articles.author: Darya Korsunskaya, Andrew Osborn, Mark Trevelyan
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin is unlikely to bow to a sanctions ultimatum expiring this Friday from U.S. President Donald Trump, and retains the goal of capturing four regions of Ukraine in their entirety, sources close to the Kremlin told Reuters.
articles.title: Exclusive: Putin doubts potency of Trump's ultimatum to end the war
